name: Framework Methodology Compliance
description: Ensures responses follow the active framework methodology (CAGEERF, ReACT, 5W1H, SCAMPER). This is a framework-level gate that applies universally across all categories when a framework is active.
guidance:
**Framework Methodology Compliance:**
- CAGEERF: Include Context, Analysis, Goals, Execution, Evaluation, Refinement, Framework considerations
- ReACT: Show clear Reasoning and Acting phases with systematic problem-solving
- 5W1H: Address Who, What, When, Where, Why, How in comprehensive analysis
- SCAMPER: Apply creative thinking techniques (Substitute, Combine, Adapt, Modify, Put to other uses, Eliminate, Reverse)
- Structure responses according to framework principles
- Include systematic thinking and methodology awareness
- Show iterative improvement and refinement processes
_comment_llm_validation: LLM self-check removed until API integration complete. Will be re-added when config.analysis.semanticAnalysis.llmIntegration is fully implemented.
_comment: Framework gates apply universally - no category restrictions. Activated by framework context only.
